column1: Baby Barnaby's////The breakfast potatoes are the bomb and the bacon is the real deal. I'm talking thick cut
column2: manly bacon. Not for wimps! The biscuits are yummy and the coffee is pretty good. Not excellent
column3: but it gets the job done. People who complain about the parking situation need to come to Boston and see what a real parking shortage looks like. I think we had to walk like half a block during prime breakfast hours
column4: which was fine by me. I'm coming back to Houston in a few months and will most definitely be back.
